host.description: The address of the CDAP instance.

token.description: The OAuth token to use for all http calls to the instance.

name.description: The name of the application. This will be used as the unique identifier in the CDAP API.

namespace.description: The name of the namespace in which this resource belongs. If not provided, the default namespace is used.

spec.description: The full contents of the exported pipeline JSON spec.

jar_binary_path.description: The GCS path to the JAR binary for the artifact.

json_config_path.description: The GCS path to the JSON config of the artifact.

namespace.description: The name of the namespace in which this resource belongs. If not provided, the default namespace is used.

version.description: The version of the artifact. Must match the version in the JAR manifest.

jar_binary_path.description: The local path to the JAR binary for the artifact.

json_config_path.description: The local path to the JSON config of the artifact.

namespace.description: The name of the namespace in which this resource belongs. If not provided, the default namespace is used.

version.description: The version of the artifact. Must match the version in the JAR manifest.

namespace.description: The name of the namespace in which this resource belongs. If not provided, the default namespace is used.

preferences.description: The preferences to set on the namespace.

label.description: A user friendly label for the profile.

namespace.description: The name of the namespace in which this resource belongs. If not provided, the default namespace is used.

is_editable.description: Whether the value can be updated.

namespace.description: The name of the namespace in which this resource belongs. If not provided, the default namespace is used.

run_id.description: The run the CDAP Run ID

runtime_arguments.description: The runtime arguments used to start the program

type.description: One of flows, mapreduce, services, spark, workers, or workflows.
